ratings.rComments: Solomon is great. He is a good lecturer and has a lot of funny stories. The class is easy, just memorize the study guides and practice tests and you can easily get an A on the tests. Loved the class!

I lost a lot of points because I never showed up to lecture, but I did show up for discussion all the time. Lots of little assignments here and there, and there's no actual final but there are 3 MC midterms and 3 in discussion essays. I did alright in that class, but it's definitely not an easy gen. ed like you would have wanted.

Very interesting class. Solomon is really interesting lecturer and he loves telling stories about his expeditions that relate to the material taught in lectures. Exams require a bit of memorization but you can spend a couple of hours before the exam memorizing and easily pull off an A.
Just a really funny guy. It's like having a comedian as a professor.
amazing teacher!!!

Solomons is a great professor, but I did not enjoy his class at all. There is a lot of busy work, and a lot of reading and memorization. Lots of little assignments you have to do. Workbook and discussion book are expensive and mandatory, and assignments require you to tear out pages, making them worthless at the end of the semester.

Not to confuse with CLCV 115111. 116 is the Roman Achievement! SO SO easy! 4 one page papers, 3 of which you can rewrite. I went in for help on the fourth but the TA just gave me a 4545 instead. Two 80 point multiple choice tests that are solely memorization like literally memorize all dates, authors, books etc. Random web searches etc but easy
Jon Solomon is one of the best professors I've had so far.  He is extremely knowledgeable about his topics and wants to spread his knowledge to you.

Solomon was such an interesting guy! He made the class a blast. The material was all in one convenient book made by him, saving you money instead of having to buy a million books. The papers and assignments were easily done and quickly done. Some reading, but it was interesting. TAs were typically eccentric and fun as well. Great, fun professor.

This class so easy. 4 papers, 3 of which are 1 page and the 4th one is 3-5 pgs double spaced. a good amount of websearches and prequizzes which are easy and I could do in class during lecture. The tests are pure memorization of the exact information so lecture is kind of unnecessary. And for every paper, he basically told us what to write. EASY.
Incredible professor, makes class so much fun. Cracks jokes and has a good time teaching. Highly recommend taking his class!

Solomon was one of the best professors I had this semester. He was really engaging and made the course fun. He's really knowledgeable on the subject. If you need a gen ed class, this is definitely a class worth taking!

Great lecturer and you can tell he is passionate about the subjects which make it an interesting class. Solomon is a real smart guy, that is evident. The exams are as easy as memorizing a list of terms. If you do the work an A is impossible not to get. My only complaint is that he is so busy he can't dedicate a ton of time to students emails.

One of my favorite professors at UIUC!! He is completely entertaining and loves to share his life stories, very passionate about subject! I would recommend this class to anyone who has the slightest interest in the subject! You will learn a lot. Tests are all multiple choice and he gives you a study guide that the questions come straight off of

Great professor, very interested in topic which makes the class very interesting. I really enjoyed the class and the workload was very easy to handle. I would highly recommend over CLCV 111/115 just because of the smaller size and there is no discussion section.

Solomon is super chill and hilarious. His TA is too if you just talk to him.  I found that I didn't need to read any assignments in order to pass the class, but what he aims for is that you become an educated individual, so you can sound intelligent.  I found his lessons useful in other aspects of my life, but again it's not mandatory lectures.

Class not mandatory at all, but he is very entertaining. Basically tells you everything you need to know for the exams, and put forth some effort for the writings. Even though there are a lot of readings, I never really read them and I did fine!

This class is fairly easy however WAY too much work for a gen ed.  There's a ton of reading that he expects you to do and his lectures are completely pointless, all he does is read the textbook to you and shows you some video clips.  There's A TON of writing in this class as well.  Overall bad class

BEST teacher! You buy the workbook for his class and there is a decent amount of reading but nothing strenuous. He is very funny. He's excellent in using things from current movies and such  to tie to points he is trying to make. Although attendance is not mandatory, I enjoyed going to his class. He's very knowledgable and humorous!

All your preconceived notions about this class and professor are probably accurate. Taking it with Solomon is not only fun but also very easy to do well. No "textbook" but a lot of supplemental material and course workbooks.

Solomon was a wonderful professor. His class was not only easy, it was interesting and intriguing. There was not a cumulative final, only a "last test." He's very into what he's teaching and he passes on his passion to his students.

His class was easy and entertaining, being humorous and  making tests that, while you do have to study at least 2 hours for, are more than fair and in-class tests that are extremely easy since he literally tells you the answer after he tells you the question. I recommend him for any class he teaches because he's a really awesome guy.
Solomon is the man. He keeps lectures entertaining and is very helpful. Super easy class. Only two tests all semester and 3 papers. You can rewrite all the papers. TAKE ANY CLASS WITH HIM
The best professor ever
He is awesome! Very funny! He makes his lectures interesting, and as long as you do the assignments you'll be fine!
He is awesome.
Solomon cracked me up! Easy class, interesting lecture (and I'm an engineer), and good communication. Just get a good TA and your set. The exams are a joke.

I thought he was hilarious. Often makes jokes, tells stories, and swears during lecture. He makes the class fun where it could be quite boring. I enjoyed lecture quite a bit, plus the multiple choice exams are SO EASY if you go to class. He knows what he is doing and he knows how to entertain a lecture hall of 300+. I highly recommend him.

GREAT professor. Powerpoints are really interesting and he is very smart and knowledgeable. The class is really easy too because he teaches the information so well. Exams are not hard, just use the study guides that are provided in the required text and you will ace them. Highly recommended professor, take ANY class he teaches.

I thoroughly enjoyed listening to this professor speak about so many things from philosophy, to influences of Greco-Roman culture in modern times. I agree with a previous comment that he is one of the most knowledgeable professors on campus that can keep you listening

Jon is amazing. The most fun, interesting, captivating and knowledgeable professor i've ever had. Lecture notes aren't online so you have to go to class but it's worth it- he makes the class a blast. Not hard material either, very intriguing. take this class! i love jon!

you are required to buy a course book which has study guides for each exam. just study whats on the study guide then you will be set. exams are very easy but essay exams are annoying especially your ta is anal about thesis and 5 paragraphs. some readings are long
Exams were really easy as long as the relevant stories were read(or summaries were read). Pretty funny guy with interesting material. I'd take it again.

The work load of this course is a lot more than I anticipated. If you are looking for a fairly simple gen ed look elsewhere. Yes, the class is interesting and exams are straight forward, but time would be better spent studying for other classes.
Easy class. Exams are super easy. Goes over all the material in lecture so reading isn't necessary but you need the book for the random quizzes in class.

The Best class I've ever taken so far! Solomon makes his class very entertaining through showing movie clips and even throwing in some personal stories and pictures. The class wasn't hard but homework had to be done to get a good grade. For exams, just memorize the required pages and stories and you'll get an A.

The funniest professor I have ever had and definitely knows what he is talking about. Wants everyone to do well and connects movies with mythology which was pretty cool. Also had him for a discussion and he was really cool. Take classes with him!
I enjoyed my study abroad experience with Prof. Soloman. He made Rome a very fun and intersecting place, always eager to answer questions and always provided good info. Brilliant man !

Amazing teacher, amazing class.  Very manageable workload, we read 2 books, he highlighted each chapter in class so you knew the important things, wrote 3 1-page papers, a bunch of workbook stuff, and 2 tests, no final.  He makes intro to greek cultures actually interesting and easy!  If you need a gen ed make sure you take this class with him!

If you don't like mythology, you're not going to be too interested in his class. It is, however, very easy and because I love mythology, very very interesting. This man actually knows everything by heart and loves his subject. He's really funny in class and likes to make fun of himself. He makes lots of pop culture references. Lauren's the best TA!
Jon Solomon, ... I wish all my professors were like Jon Solomon.

Decent professor and easy but boring class.  The lectures are pointless and boring but he gives out simple attendance assignments sometimes.  There are some books to read for the class but you don't need to read them.  There are three, one page essays that are really easy and the tests are all memorized multiple choice.  Overall easy gen ed.

A really awesome professor.  All the homeworks and tests are easy if you put in just a little time.  Some people say he's not cool in office hours, but I've been several times and he's nothing but nice and easy to talk to.  His lectures are interesting and amusing.

AMAZING PROFESSOR! I loved this class. So easy if you pay attention during lecture. He explains everything and goes over all readings, so you don't even have to read them (even though the readings are all extremely interesting). Homework, papers, and tests are ridiculously easy. Most intelligent teacher I've ever had. TAKE THIS CLASS!

Excellent professor! Keeps the class interesting with the use of media and passion. I highly recommend this course for anyone trying to complete their non-western requirement. It is also a double dipper! I was intimidated by the syllabus at first but after taking the class, one should not be. The papers are very fair and he allows a re-write.

EASY and INTERESTING class!  Great teacher!  He is so understanding and lenient.  He is one of the only teachers who realize that gen eds are not top priorities.  Tests are all multiple choice, and he gives you a study guide.  You get to rewrite all three papers if you get a bad grade.  As long as you fill out the homework you will get a 100%!

Jon Solomon is by far one of the best teachers I've ever had.  His interest in the subject matter is both a pleasant surprise and contagious, as he makes great jokes ("My name ith Arithtotle, I'm a philothopher!"), and has quality slide-shows which include video and clear images of the most famous historical art.  Take his class and love it.
Reaallyy..not so good. I signed up for the class because I saw good reviews here, but I don't quite agree with them.

He is the best teacher in this school.  He is really committed to his subject area.  He uses different kinds of technology to teach the class and it is all around interesting.  I took an extra class of his just because he is an awesome teacher!
Best class I've taken at UofI. Lectures are interesting and pretty funny. As long as you study exactly what he tells you you'll be more than prepared for exams.
this class would be so easy if our TA wasn't so hard on our papers.
Exasperatingly easy.
Solomon is easy, interesting, and has one of the most entertaining lectures on campus.

good class, quizzes are easy and the material is interesting enough. the homework isn't too bad, and tests are fine. i don't know if it's because of prior knowledge or the class, but i seemed to know the material pretty well during and after i took the class. recommend!

This professor's grading is extremely easy and fair.  His tests are just worksheets (front and back), one page.  He is very lighthearted in lecture.  However, I agree with what others have said about his awkward office-visit demeanor.  He is extremely cold and mean in person.

SO EASY!the only time you actually have to work for the class is the 3 essays.But its still easy becos he gives you lots of hints and its googleable.The midterms are SO easy if you did study,its so BASIC.
Do not listen to what anyone on this board says. this teacher is incredibly easy, as well as nice. and hsi TA grades like were in junior highschool. TAKE a class with solomon!

The subject matter he covers is often pretty boring, but he makes it interesting. He is always making jokes ("Terence is like South Park"), and if you come to lectures, he gives you the answers to pop quizzes. A lot of reading is required, but you don't have to read everything to get a good grade in the class. A lot of writing is required too.

pretty rude and he doenst even answer his students emails. Also, the exams require a ton of memorization of little facts that have nothing to do with the lectures he gives. The Ta's are way too critical when they grade the essays

This guy has been the coolest techer i've had all year, he is hilarious he spoon feeds answers to 'pop' quizes. Even though there are alot of LONG reading assignments, if you're interested in it, it's not so bad.
Awesome

Although you need to read a lot of materials for this class, they are not that difficult if you are interested in learning Greek Mythology. Also the assignments are not that hard and it's easy to get all of them right. Prof.Solomon is very nice. But one of his TAs is a bit too critical.
Awesome professor. Hilarious, tons of pop culture references in every lecture. Long reading assignments, but I rarely bothered to do them. Wish he taught engineering.
No Comments

This has been my favorite class so far.  It's the one class the entire year that I actually look forward going to.  His lectures are actually very interesting and he is very humorous, and not in a cheesy way like a lot of the professors at the U of I.  I definitely recomment taking this or any other of his courses.

This guy is hilarious. He is the only professor I've seen that can make a whole theater full of students laugh. He makes his tests easy, he gives hints to answers on pop quizzes, and the material is interesting.  I learned a lot of cool trivia in this class. TAKE THIS CLASS. Jon Solomon is awesome.
No Comments
